EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1 - EMEA/US - 2015.02.17.Email - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1? Join our Webinar to find out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis would like to wish you a happy new year by presenting our new 8.3 Service Pack 1 Release. The new year brings many new features to help enhance the Tosca Testsuite experience. We are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all our cool new features through our ‘What’s New’ Webinar.
Our VP of Product Management, Gerd Weishaar and Roman Zednik, Director Presales Worldwide will be walking you through all our new features, which will include:
- X-Scan - Support: Siebel Open UI - Taas with Web Automation - Image Based Test Automation - Extras: Loops & Conditions, Mobile+
Our ‘What’s New’ Webinar will take place on February 17, 2015 starting at 4:00 p.m. CET. Don’t miss out!
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Feb 17, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Director Presales Worldwide Tricentis
